title: My cat is the cutest cat

description.part1: He goes meow meow meow meow

about.para1: Yacho Master was made with love by Anna after taking the amazing Full Stack Open course by the University of Helsinki (parts 1 through 7)! Full Stack Open is a free course where you can learn React, Redux, Node.js, MongoDB and more, and as of this writing is available in Finnish, English, Chinese, and Spanish.
about.para2: This app uses recordings from Xeno-Canto, and the images are from Flickr.
about.para3: All of the bird recordings on Xeno-Canto are released under one of the Creative Commons Licenses. If you enjoyed this app and have personal bird recordings, please consider uploading your recordings to Xeno-Canto or releasing them under a Creative Commons license so others can use them for education and science!
